subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Seahawks controlled the ball for 41 minutes 56 seconds and relied on the legs of Marshawn Lynch to stifle the Eagles, holding them to their worst yardage output, 139, since 2005.
snippet: The Seahawks controlled the ball for 41 minutes 56 seconds and relied on the legs of Marshawn Lynch to stifle the Eagles, holding them to their worst yardage output, 139, since 2005.
